info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:12PM MDT until July 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KIT CARSON COUNTY... At 512 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Vona, or 9 miles southeast of Seibert, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stratton, Bethune and Vona. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 407 and 434. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
